text: Darby's Rangers (released in the UK as The Young Invaders) is a 1958 American World War II drama movie directed by William A. Wellman and is based on the 1945 novel by Major James J. Altieri. It stars James Garner, Jack Warden, Edd Byrnes, Stuart Whitman, Murray Hamilton, Etchika Choureau and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:1958 war movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman Category:Movies set in deserts
title: Darby's Rangers (1958 movie)
